title: Mina Kimes on Jalen Ramsey, Patriots, Division Previews (Football 08/31)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by ESPN Sr. Writer Mina Kimes to break down every single NFL division, starting with the AFC South, which features the Jaguars, who feature Jalen Ramsey, who Mina just wrote a story on (if you haven't read it yet, go find it, he goes nuclear once more). They also wonder why Jon Gruden is letting Tom Cable have a bunch of power, if the Patriots drama is real, who Mina would pick to save her life between Joe Flacco and Andy Dalton, if the Saints or Falcons are better, if Jerry Jones has a Faustian deal with the devil, what Brian Schottenheimer's offense will look like and why Aaron Rodgers didn't take Kirk Cousins' type of contract, plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
